00021     BDTHelper::BDTHelper(TString importBDTFile) {
00022 
00023         // Import the python packages and load the features into xgboost.
00024         // FIXME: These debug prints can be removed.
00025         TPython::Exec("print 'Importing BDT python packages'");
00026         TPython::Exec("print 'importing xgb'; import xgboost as xgb; print xgb");
00027         TPython::Exec("print 'importing numpy'; import numpy as np; print np");
00028         TPython::Exec("print 'importing pkl'; import pickle as pkl; print pkl");
00029         std::cout << "Unpickling bdt from file = " << importBDTFile << std::endl;
00030         TPython::Exec("print 'importing model in xgb'; model = pkl.load(open('" + importBDTFile + "','r')); print model");
00031         // ; model.dump_model('model.txt')
00032     }
00033 
00034     void BDTHelper::buildFeatureVector(std::vector<float>& bdtFeatures, ldmx::EcalVetoResult& result) {
00035         /*for (int i = 0; i < 33; i++) {
00036             bdtFeatures.push_back(result.getEcalLayerEdepReadout()[i]);
00037         }*/
00038         bdtFeatures.push_back(result.getNReadoutHits());
00039         bdtFeatures.push_back(result.getNLooseIsoHits());
00040         bdtFeatures.push_back(result.getNTightIsoHits());
00041         bdtFeatures.push_back(result.nLooseMipTracks());
00042         bdtFeatures.push_back(result.nMediumMipTracks());
00043         bdtFeatures.push_back(result.nTightMipTracks());
00044         bdtFeatures.push_back(result.getSummedDet());
00045         bdtFeatures.push_back(result.getSummedOuter());
00046         bdtFeatures.push_back(result.getBackSummedDep());
00047         bdtFeatures.push_back(result.getSummedLooseIso());
00048         bdtFeatures.push_back(result.getMaxLooseIsoDep());
00049         bdtFeatures.push_back(result.getSummedTightIso());
00050         bdtFeatures.push_back(result.getMaxTightIsoDep());
00051         bdtFeatures.push_back(result.getMaxCellDep());
00052         bdtFeatures.push_back(result.getShowerRMS());
00053         double maxLen = 0, summedDep = 0;
00054         for (auto track : result.getLooseMipTracks()) {
00055             if (track.first > maxLen)
00056                 maxLen = track.first;
00057             summedDep += track.second;
00058         }
00059         bdtFeatures.push_back(maxLen);
00060         bdtFeatures.push_back(summedDep);
00061 
00062         maxLen = 0, summedDep = 0;
00063         for (auto track : result.getMediumMipTracks()) {
00064             if (track.first > maxLen)
00065                 maxLen = track.first;
00066             summedDep += track.second;
00067         }
00068         bdtFeatures.push_back(maxLen);
00069         bdtFeatures.push_back(summedDep);
00070 
00071         maxLen = 0, summedDep = 0;
00072         for (auto track : result.getTightMipTracks()) {
00073             if (track.first > maxLen)
00074                 maxLen = track.first;
00075             summedDep += track.second;
00076         }
00077         bdtFeatures.push_back(maxLen);
00078         bdtFeatures.push_back(summedDep);
00079     }

00082     float BDTHelper::getSinglePred(std::vector<float> bdtFeatures) {
00083         TString cmd = vectorToPredCMD(bdtFeatures);
00084         TPython::Exec("pred = " + cmd);
00085         float pred = TPython::Eval("pred");
00086         std::cout << "  pred = " << pred << std::endl;
00087 
00088         return pred;
00089     }
00090 
00091     TString BDTHelper::vectorToPredCMD(std::vector<float> bdtFeatures) {
00092         TString featuresStrVector = "[[";
00093         for (int i = 0; i < bdtFeatures.size(); i++) {
00094             featuresStrVector += std::to_string(bdtFeatures[i]);
00095             if (i < bdtFeatures.size() - 1)
00096                 featuresStrVector += ",";
00097         }
00098         featuresStrVector += "]]";
00099         TString cmd = "float(model.predict(xgb.DMatrix(np.array(" + featuresStrVector + ")))[0])";
00100 
00101         return cmd;
00102     }

00104     void EcalVetoProcessor::configure(const ParameterSet& ps) {
00105 
00106         doBdt_ = ps.getInteger("do_bdt");
00107         if (doBdt_){
00108             // Config and init the BDT.
00109             bdtFileName_ = ps.getString("bdt_file", "bdt.pkl");
00110             if (!std::ifstream(bdtFileName_).good()) {
00111                 EXCEPTION_RAISE("EcalVetoProcessor",
00112                         "The specified BDT file '" + bdtFileName_ + "' does not exist!");
00113             }
00114 
00115             BDTHelper_ = new BDTHelper(bdtFileName_);
00116         }
00117         hexReadout_ = new EcalHexReadout();
00118         nEcalLayers_ = ps.getInteger("num_ecal_layers");
00119         backEcalStartingLayer_ = ps.getInteger("back_ecal_starting_layer");
00120 
00121         bdtCutVal_ = ps.getDouble("disc_cut");
00122         ecalLayerEdepRaw_.resize(nEcalLayers_, 0);
00123         ecalLayerEdepReadout_.resize(nEcalLayers_, 0);
00124         ecalLayerOuterRaw_.resize(nEcalLayers_, 0);
00125         ecalLayerOuterReadout_.resize(nEcalLayers_, 0);
00126         ecalLayerTime_.resize(nEcalLayers_, 0);
00127         cellMap_.resize(nEcalLayers_, std::map<int, float>());
00128         cellMapLooseIso_.resize(nEcalLayers_, std::map<int, float>());
00129         cellMapTightIso_.resize(nEcalLayers_, std::map<int, float>());
00130     }
00131 
00132     void EcalVetoProcessor::clearProcessor(){
00133         for (int i = 0; i < nEcalLayers_; i++) {
00134             cellMap_[i].clear();
00135             cellMapLooseIso_[i].clear();
00136             cellMapTightIso_[i].clear();
00137         }
00138         looseMipTracks_.clear();
00139         mediumMipTracks_.clear();
00140         tightMipTracks_.clear();
00141         bdtFeatures_.clear();
00142 
00143         nReadoutHits_ = 0;
00144         nLooseIsoHits_ = 0;
00145         nTightIsoHits_ = 0;
00146         summedDet_ = 0;
00147         summedOuter_ = 0;
00148         backSummedDet_ = 0;
00149         summedLooseIso_ = 0;
00150         maxLooseIsoDep_ = 0;
00151         summedTightIso_ = 0;
00152         maxTightIsoDep_ = 0;
00153         maxCellDep_ = 0;
00154         showerRMS_ = 0;
00155 
00156         std::fill(ecalLayerEdepRaw_.begin(), ecalLayerEdepRaw_.end(), 0);
00157         std::fill(ecalLayerEdepReadout_.begin(), ecalLayerEdepReadout_.end(), 0);
00158         std::fill(ecalLayerOuterRaw_.begin(), ecalLayerOuterRaw_.end(), 0);
00159         std::fill(ecalLayerOuterReadout_.begin(), ecalLayerOuterReadout_.end(), 0);
00160         std::fill(ecalLayerTime_.begin(), ecalLayerTime_.end(), 0);
00161     }
00162 
00163     void EcalVetoProcessor::produce(Event& event) {
00164         result_.Clear();
00165         clearProcessor();
00166 
00167         // FIXME: These commands should go above the corresponding variables.
00168         /* New expanded variable collection to help with background veto */
00169         /* Loose isolated hits -- Any hit with no readout in nearest neighbors */
00170         /* Any isolated hit that does have the event centroid as a nearest neighbor */
00171         /* Loose tracks -- two consecutive layers w/ projected nearest neighbor loose isolated hits */
00172         /* Medium tracks -- three consecutive layers w/ projected nearest neighbor loose isolated hits */
00173         /* Tight tracks -- three consecutive layers w/ projected nearest neighbor tight isolated hits */
00174 
00175         // Get the collection of digitized Ecal hits from the event. 
00176         const TClonesArray* ecalDigis = event.getCollection("ecalDigis");
00177         int nEcalHits = ecalDigis->GetEntriesFast();
00178 
00179         std::cout << "[ EcalVetoProcessor ] : Got " << nEcalHits << " ECal digis in event "
00180                 << event.getEventHeader()->getEventNumber() << std::endl;
00181 
00182         int globalCentroid = GetShowerCentroidIDAndRMS(ecalDigis, showerRMS_);
00183         /* ~~ Fill the hit map ~~ O(n)  */
00184         fillHitMap(ecalDigis, cellMap_);
00185         bool doTight = true;
00186         /* ~~ Fill the isolated hit maps ~~ O(n)  */
00187         fillIsolatedHitMap(ecalDigis, globalCentroid, cellMap_, cellMapTightIso_, doTight);
00188         fillIsolatedHitMap(ecalDigis, globalCentroid, cellMap_, cellMapLooseIso_, !doTight);
00189         int trackLen = 2;
00190 
00191         //Loop over the hits from the event to calculate the rest of the important quantities
00192         for (int iHit = 0; iHit < nEcalHits; iHit++) {
00193             //Layer-wise quantities
00194             EcalHit* hit = (EcalHit*) ecalDigis->At(iHit);
00195             LayerCellPair hit_pair = hitToPair(hit);
00196             ecalLayerEdepRaw_[hit_pair.first] = ecalLayerEdepRaw_[hit_pair.first] + hit->getEnergy();
00197             if (maxCellDep_ < hit->getEnergy())
00198                 maxCellDep_ = hit->getEnergy();
00199             if (hit->getEnergy() > 0) {
00200                 nReadoutHits_++;
00201                 ecalLayerEdepReadout_[hit_pair.first] += hit->getEnergy();
00202                 ecalLayerTime_[hit_pair.first] += (hit->getEnergy()) * hit->getTime();
00203             }
00204             //Check Outer
00205             if (!(isInShowerInnerRing(globalCentroid, hit_pair.second))
00206                     && !(isInShowerOuterRing(globalCentroid, hit_pair.second))
00207                     && !(hit_pair.second == globalCentroid)) {
00208 
00209                 ecalLayerOuterRaw_[hit_pair.first] += hit->getEnergy();
00210 
00211                 if (hit->getEnergy() > 0)
00212                     ecalLayerOuterReadout_[hit_pair.first] += hit->getEnergy();
00213             }
00214         }
00215 
00216         // end loop over sim hits
00217 
00218         for (int iLayer = 0; iLayer < ecalLayerEdepReadout_.size(); iLayer++) {
00219             for (auto cell : cellMapLooseIso_[iLayer]) {
00220                 if (cell.second > 0) {
00221                     nLooseIsoHits_++;
00222                     summedLooseIso_ += cell.second;
00223                 }
00224 
00225                 if (cell.second > maxLooseIsoDep_) {
00226                     maxLooseIsoDep_ = cell.second;
00227                 }
00228             }
00229             for (auto cell : cellMapTightIso_[iLayer]) {
00230                 if (cell.second > 0) {
00231                     nTightIsoHits_++;
00232                     summedTightIso_ += cell.second;
00233                 }
00234 
00235                 if (cell.second > maxTightIsoDep_) {
00236                     maxTightIsoDep_ = cell.second;
00237                 }
00238             }
00239             ecalLayerTime_[iLayer] = ecalLayerTime_[iLayer] / ecalLayerEdepReadout_[iLayer];
00240             summedDet_ += ecalLayerEdepReadout_[iLayer];
00241             summedOuter_ += ecalLayerOuterReadout_[iLayer];
00242             if (iLayer > backEcalStartingLayer_)
00243                 backSummedDet_ += ecalLayerEdepReadout_[iLayer];
00244         }
00245 
00246         /*std::cout << "[ EcalVetoProcessor ]:\n" 
00247          << "\t EdepRaw[0] : " << EcalLayerEdepRaw_[0] << "\n"
00248          << "\t EdepReadout[0] : " << EcalLayerEdepReadout_[0] << "\n"
00249          << "\t EdepLayerOuterRaw[0] : " << EcalLayerOuterRaw_[0] << "\n"
00250          << "\t EdepLayerOuterReadout[0] : " << EcalLayerOuterReadout_[0] << "\n"
00251          << "\t EdepLayerTime[0] : " << EcalLayerTime_[0] << "\n"
00252          << "\t Shower Median: " << showerMedianCellId
00253          << std::endl;*/
00254 
00255         /* ~~ Fill the mip tracks ~~ O(n_iso^2)  */
00256         std::vector<std::map<int, float>> looseIsoCopy(cellMapLooseIso_);
00257         fillMipTracks(cellMapLooseIso_, looseMipTracks_, trackLen);
00258         trackLen = 3;
00259         fillMipTracks(looseIsoCopy, mediumMipTracks_, trackLen);
00260         fillMipTracks(cellMapTightIso_, tightMipTracks_, trackLen);
00261 
00262         // Get the collection of Ecal scoring plane hits. If it doesn't exist,
00263         // don't bother adding any truth tracking information.
00264 
00265         std::vector<double> recoilP;
00266         std::vector<float> recoilPos;
00267 
00268         if (event.exists("EcalScoringPlaneHits")) {
00269             const TClonesArray* ecalSpHits{event.getCollection("EcalScoringPlaneHits")};
00270 
00271             // Loop through all of the sim particles and find the recoil 
00272             // electron.
00273             const TClonesArray* simParticles{event.getCollection("SimParticles")};
00274             SimParticle* recoilElectron{nullptr}; 
00275             for (int simParticleIndex = 0; simParticleIndex < simParticles->GetEntriesFast();
00276                     ++simParticleIndex) { 
00277                 SimParticle* particle = static_cast<SimParticle*>(simParticles->At(simParticleIndex)); 
00278 
00279                 // We only care about the recoil electron
00280                 if ((particle->getPdgID() == 11) && (particle->getParentCount() == 0)) { 
00281                     recoilElectron = particle;
00282                     break;
00283                 } 
00284             }
00285 
00286             for (int ecalSpIndex = 0; ecalSpIndex < ecalSpHits->GetEntriesFast(); ++ecalSpIndex) {
00287                 SimTrackerHit* spHit =  static_cast<SimTrackerHit*>(ecalSpHits->At(ecalSpIndex)); 
00288                 
00289                 if (spHit->getLayerID() != 1) continue;
00290                 
00291                 SimParticle* spParticle = spHit->getSimParticle();
00292                 if (spParticle == recoilElectron) { 
00293                     recoilP = spHit->getMomentum();
00294                     recoilPos = spHit->getPosition();
00295                     if (recoilP[2] <= 0) continue; 
00296                     /*std::cout << "[ EcalVetoProcessor ]: " 
00297                               << "Recoil momentum: [ " 
00298                               << recoilP[0] 
00299                               << ", " << recoilP[1]  
00300                               << ", " << recoilP[2] << " ]" << std::endl;*/
00301                     break;
00302                 } 
00303             }
00304         }
00305 
00306         result_.setVariables(nReadoutHits_, nLooseIsoHits_, nTightIsoHits_, summedDet_, summedOuter_, backSummedDet_,
00307                 summedLooseIso_, maxLooseIsoDep_, summedTightIso_, maxTightIsoDep_, maxCellDep_, showerRMS_,
00308                 ecalLayerEdepReadout_, looseMipTracks_, mediumMipTracks_, tightMipTracks_, recoilP, recoilPos);
00309         if (doBdt_) {
00310             BDTHelper_->buildFeatureVector(bdtFeatures_, result_);
00311             float pred = BDTHelper_->getSinglePred(bdtFeatures_);
00312             result_.setVetoResult(pred > bdtCutVal_);
00313             result_.setDiscValue(pred);
00314             std::cout << "  pred > bdtCutVal = " << (pred > bdtCutVal_) << std::endl;
00315         }
00316         event.addToCollection("EcalVeto", result_);
00317     }
00318 
00319     EcalVetoProcessor::LayerCellPair EcalVetoProcessor::hitToPair(EcalHit* hit) {
00320         int detIDraw = hit->getID();
00321         detID_.setRawValue(detIDraw);
00322         detID_.unpack();
00323         int layer = detID_.getFieldValue("layer");
00324         int cellid = detID_.getFieldValue("cell");
00325         int moduleid = detID_.getFieldValue("module_position");
00326         int combinedid = cellid*10+moduleid;
00327         return (std::make_pair(layer, combinedid));
00328     }
00329 
00330     /* Function to calculate the energy weighted shower centroid */
00331     int EcalVetoProcessor::GetShowerCentroidIDAndRMS(const TClonesArray* ecalDigis, double& showerRMS) {
00332         int nEcalHits = ecalDigis->GetEntriesFast();
00333         XYCoords wgtCentroidCoords = std::make_pair<float, float>(0., 0.);
00334         float sumEdep = 0;
00335         int returnCellId = 1e6;
00336         //Calculate Energy Weighted Centroid
00337         for (int hitCounter = 0; hitCounter < nEcalHits; ++hitCounter) {
00338             EcalHit* hit = static_cast<EcalHit*>(ecalDigis->At(hitCounter));
00339             LayerCellPair hit_pair = hitToPair(hit);
00340             CellEnergyPair cell_energy_pair = std::make_pair(hit_pair.second, hit->getEnergy());
00341             XYCoords centroidCoords = getCellCentroidXYPair(hit_pair.second);
00342             wgtCentroidCoords.first = wgtCentroidCoords.first + centroidCoords.first * cell_energy_pair.second;
00343             wgtCentroidCoords.second = wgtCentroidCoords.second + centroidCoords.second * cell_energy_pair.second;
00344             sumEdep += cell_energy_pair.second;
00345         }
00346         wgtCentroidCoords.first = (sumEdep > 1E-6) ? wgtCentroidCoords.first / sumEdep : wgtCentroidCoords.first;
00347         wgtCentroidCoords.second = (sumEdep > 1E-6) ? wgtCentroidCoords.second / sumEdep : wgtCentroidCoords.second;
00348         //Find Nearest Cell to Centroid
00349         float maxDist = 1e6;
00350         for (int hitCounter = 0; hitCounter < nEcalHits; ++hitCounter) {
00351             EcalHit* hit = static_cast<EcalHit*>(ecalDigis->At(hitCounter));
00352             LayerCellPair hit_pair = hitToPair(hit);
00353             XYCoords centroidCoords = getCellCentroidXYPair(hit_pair.second);
00354 
00355             float deltaR = pow(pow((centroidCoords.first - wgtCentroidCoords.first), 2) + pow((centroidCoords.second - wgtCentroidCoords.second), 2), .5);
00356             showerRMS += deltaR * hit->getEnergy();
00357             if (deltaR < maxDist) {
00358                 maxDist = deltaR;
00359                 returnCellId = hit_pair.second;
00360             }
00361         }
00362         if (sumEdep > 0)
00363             showerRMS = showerRMS / sumEdep;
00364         return returnCellId;
00365     }
00366 
00367                 /* Function to load up empty vector of hit maps */
00368     void EcalVetoProcessor::fillHitMap(const TClonesArray* ecalDigis,
00369             std::vector<std::map<int, float>>& cellMap_) {
00370         int nEcalHits = ecalDigis->GetEntriesFast();
00371         for (int hitCounter = 0; hitCounter < nEcalHits; ++hitCounter) {
00372             EcalHit* hit = static_cast<EcalHit*>(ecalDigis->At(
00373                     hitCounter));
00374             LayerCellPair hit_pair = hitToPair(hit);
00375 
00376             CellEnergyPair cell_energy_pair = std::make_pair(
00377                     hit_pair.second, hit->getEnergy());
00378             cellMap_[hit_pair.first].insert(cell_energy_pair);
00379         }
00380     }
00381 
00382     void EcalVetoProcessor::fillIsolatedHitMap(const TClonesArray* ecalDigis, float globalCentroid,
00383             std::vector<std::map<int, float>>& cellMap_, std::vector<std::map<int, float>>& cellMapIso_, bool doTight) {
00384         int nEcalHits = ecalDigis->GetEntriesFast();
00385         for (int hitCounter = 0; hitCounter < nEcalHits; ++hitCounter) {
00386             std::pair<bool, int> isolatedHit = std::make_pair(true, 0);
00387             EcalHit* hit = static_cast<EcalHit*>(ecalDigis->At(hitCounter));
00388             LayerCellPair hit_pair = hitToPair(hit);
00389             if (doTight) {
00390                 //Disregard hits that are on the centroid.
00391                 if (hit_pair.second == globalCentroid)
00392                     continue;
00393 
00394                 //Skip hits that are on centroid inner ring
00395                 if (isInShowerInnerRing(globalCentroid, hit_pair.second)) {
00396                     continue;
00397                 }
00398             }
00399 
00400             //Skip hits that have a readout neighbor
00401             std::vector<int> cellNbrIds = getInnerRingCellIds(hit_pair.second);
00402 
00403             //Get neighboring cell id's and try to look them up in the full cell map (constant speed algo.)
00404             for (int k = 0; k < 6; k++) {
00405                 std::map<int, float>::iterator it = cellMap_[hit_pair.first].find(cellNbrIds[k]);
00406                 if (it != cellMap_[hit_pair.first].end()) {
00407                     isolatedHit = std::make_pair(false, cellNbrIds[k]);
00408                     break;
00409                 }
00410             }
00411             if (!isolatedHit.first) {
00412                 continue;
00413             }
00414             //Insert isolated hit
00415             CellEnergyPair cell_energy_pair = std::make_pair(hit_pair.second, hit->getEnergy());
00416             cellMapIso_[hit_pair.first].insert(cell_energy_pair);
00417         }
00418     }
00419 
00420     void EcalVetoProcessor::fillMipTracks(std::vector<std::map<int, float>>& cellMapIso_, std::vector<std::pair<int, float>>& trackVector, int minTrackLen) {
00421 
00422         std::vector<std::vector<int>> trackTuple;
00423         for (int iLayer = 0; iLayer < cellMapIso_.size() - 1; iLayer++) {
00424             float trackEdep = 0;
00425             //for (auto && seedCell : cellMapIso_[iLayer]){
00426             auto itEnd = cellMapIso_[iLayer].cend();
00427             for (auto it = cellMapIso_[iLayer].cbegin(); it != cellMapIso_[iLayer].cend();) {
00428 
00429                 auto seedCell = (*it);              //.second;
00430 
00431                 std::pair<int, int> trackEndPoints;
00432                 std::vector<LayerCellPair> trackCellPairs;
00433                 LayerCellPair seedCellPair = std::make_pair(iLayer, seedCell.first);
00434                 trackEdep += seedCell.second;
00435                 trackCellPairs.clear();
00436                 trackCellPairs.push_back(seedCellPair);
00437                 trackEndPoints.first = seedCell.first;
00438 
00439                 while (true) {
00440                     if (seedCellPair.first + 1 >= cellMapIso_.size() - 1) {
00441                         break;
00442                     }
00443                     float matchCellDep;
00444                     LayerCellPair matchCellPair = std::make_pair(-1, 1e6);
00445                     for (auto matchCell : cellMapIso_[seedCellPair.first + 1]) {
00446                         matchCellDep = matchCell.second;
00447                         LayerCellPair tempMatchCellPair = std::make_pair(seedCellPair.first + 1, matchCell.first);
00448                         if (tempMatchCellPair.second == seedCellPair.second || isInShowerInnerRing(tempMatchCellPair.second, seedCellPair.second)) {
00449                             matchCellPair = tempMatchCellPair;
00450                             break;
00451                         }
00452                     }
00453 
00454                     if (matchCellPair.first != -1) {
00455                         trackCellPairs.push_back(matchCellPair);
00456                         trackEdep += matchCellDep;
00457                         seedCellPair = matchCellPair;
00458                         trackEndPoints.second = matchCellPair.first;
00459                     }
00460 
00461                     else {
00462                         break;
00463                     }
00464                 }
00465 
00466                 if (trackCellPairs.size() >= minTrackLen) {
00467                     trackVector.push_back(std::make_pair(trackCellPairs.size(), trackEdep));
00468                     std::vector<int> trackInfo = {iLayer, trackEndPoints.first, trackEndPoints.second};
00469                     trackTuple.push_back(trackInfo);
00470                     int counter = 0;
00471                     cellMapIso_[iLayer].erase(it++);
00472                     for (auto cell : trackCellPairs) {
00473                         if (counter == 0) {
00474                             counter = counter + 1;
00475                             continue;
00476                         }
00477                         std::map<int, float>::iterator it_2 = cellMapIso_[cell.first].find(cell.second);
00478                         cellMapIso_[cell.first].erase(it_2);
00479 
00480                     }
00481                 } else {
00482                     it++;
00483                 }
00484             }
00485         }
00486 
00487         for (int iTrack = 0; iTrack < trackVector.size(); iTrack++) {
00488             if (iTrack >= trackVector.size() - 1)
00489                 break;
00490             int prevEndLayer = trackTuple[iTrack][0];
00491             int prevEndId = trackTuple[iTrack][2];
00492             int prevLen = trackVector[iTrack].first;
00493             for (int jTrack = 0; jTrack < trackVector.size(); jTrack++) {
00494                 if (jTrack >= trackVector.size() - 1)
00495                     break;
00496                 int nextStartLayer = trackTuple[jTrack][0];
00497                 int nextStartId = trackTuple[jTrack][1];
00498                 if (prevEndLayer + prevLen != nextStartLayer - 1)
00499                     break;
00500                 if (isInShowerOuterRing(prevEndId, nextStartId)) {
00501                     trackVector[iTrack].second = trackVector[iTrack].second + trackVector[jTrack].second;
00502                     trackVector[iTrack].first = trackVector[iTrack].first + trackVector[jTrack].first;
00503                     trackTuple[iTrack][2] = trackTuple[jTrack][2];
00504 
00505                     trackVector.erase(trackVector.begin() + jTrack);
00506                     trackTuple.erase(trackTuple.begin() + jTrack);
00507                     jTrack--;
00508                 }
00509             }
00510         }
00511     }
00512 }
00513 
00514 DECLARE_PRODUCER_NS(ldmx, EcalVetoProcessor);
